Verses.Text: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا
فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا

Translations.Text: Waraayta alnnasa yadkhuloona fee deeni Allahi afwajan
Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika waistaghfirhu innahu kana tawwaban
When God’s ˹ultimate˺ help comes and the victory ˹over Mecca is achieved˺
and you ˹O Prophet˺ see the people embracing God’s Way in crowds
then glorify the praises of your Lord and seek His forgiveness, for certainly He is ever Accepting of Repentance
